issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfrRJYC4z6I](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DPfrRJYC4z6I) ### Comment > On youtube, the video of the ad is blocked, but the audio still plays, and a "skip ads" button comes up after a few seconds. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5ggpfglhkloo8oc8wkk8k44ogw04wk04vdfykfx694.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gpj-Mr56AwQ](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DGpj-Mr56AwQ) ### Comment > Not sure why this was marked as fixed? A few weeks later YouTube videos are still unplayable in Safari, either the video never loads or the site thinks I'm offline. Disabling AdGuard completely removes the problem. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1nml69sr53ogk4og0ksssw4wc8w08gg12ez8r9q8re.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1nml69sr53ogk4og0ksssw4wc8w08gg12ez8r9q8re.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.14 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
